name: Prokshov
description:
Prokshov is a First Person Parkour/Exploration game based on the player finding a legendary food. I haven't DECIDED which food but I will soon.

Bugs: Secret Entrance Clipping, Cursor Shown On Screen. 

NOTE: ALL BUGS [from this patch that i know of] ARE FIXED ON THE UPDATE IM CURRENTLY WORKING ON (AND ON THE MAC VERSION)
